name: GamiPress – WPAchievements Importer
author: GamiPress

sections.description:
GamiPress – WPAchievements Importer let’s you migrate all data from WPAchievements to GamiPress!

Features

  • Ability to move WPAchievements achievements to any GamiPress achievement type.
  • Ability to move WPAchievements quests to any GamiPress achievement type.
  • Ability to move WPAchievements points to any GamiPress points type.
  • Ability to move WPAchievements ranks to any GamiPress rank type.
  • Ability to reassign all WPAchievements user earned achievements/quests to GamiPress user earnings.

WPAchievements module support

  • Support for WPAchievements BuddyPress activity to be imported to GamiPress – BuddyPress integration.
  • Support for WPAchievements bbPress activity to be imported to GamiPress – bbPress integration.
  • Support for WPAchievements Gravity Forms activity to be imported to GamiPress – Gravity Forms integration.
  • Support for WPAchievements LearnDash activity to be imported to GamiPress – LearnDash integration.
  • Support for WPAchievements WooCommerce activity to be imported to GamiPress – WooCommerce integration.
sections.installation:
From WordPress backend

  1. Navigate to Plugins -> Add new.
  2. Click the button “Upload Plugin” next to “Add plugins” title.
  3. Upload the downloaded zip file and activate it.

Direct upload

  1. Upload the downloaded zip file into your wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Unzip the uploaded zip file.
  3. Navigate to Plugins menu on your WordPress admin area.
  4. Activate this plugin.
sections.faq:
How to import your data?

  1. Navigate to WP Admin area -> GamiPress -> Tools -> Import/Export tab.
  2. At box “WPAchievements Importer” you will find settings to set to which achievement types, points types and rank types migrate every group of data.
  3. Click the button “Start Importing Data” and wait until process gets finished.
  4. That’s all!
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • Improvements
  • Updated deprecated jQuery functions.

1.0.3

  • Added support to GamiPress 1.5.1 relationships since P2P has been deprecated.

1.0.2

  • Added support for GamiPress ranks.

1.0.1

  • Added cleanup process before start.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
